programme.title: Cars
Auti
programme.desc: Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ahuffman_2000"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar and Disney did it again!","reviewBody":"Without giving away any of the story, here's my take. I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. In my opinion, it easily beats the other animated movies released over the past year or so.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":393517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

I attended the premiere of CARS at LMS on Friday, May 26. True to Disney form, the premiere itself was spectacular. Four giant screens, live entertainment,lots of fireworks, great inclusion of military personnel, and as good of a red carpet as you can do with chain link fenced areas... This movie rates right in the middle of Pixar releases for me. I place it above Monsters Inc, A Bug's Life and Toy Story 2, but not as good as the "original", the best ever, Toy Story, and The Incredibles. Everything just looks so real in this movie. The dust stirred up when Lightning drives off, the scenery around Route 66 (well, maybe not those mountains that look like the fins of old cars). Even the shine on the clean cars looks so real. As an adult, I enjoyed the story line. I can't tell you how the kids would like it, as by the time the movie finally started, my kids were asleep. As always, don't leave your seat until all of the credits roll. Sometimes they are some of the funniest clips in the movie! You'll love them this time, as they tie back to prior Pixar movies, in a car sort of way. This is definitely a movie we'll add to the DVD collection. I really hope this movie does well since it's the first release since Disney bought Pixar. Don't go in looking for the action or adult humor of The Incredibles. If you do you'll be disappointed. Just go in looking for the "Disney always has a good moral behind its animated movies" type of movie and you will really enjoy it. Paul Newman and Larry the Cable Guy really have the best characters in the movie. And while John Ratzenberger's character doesn't have a lot of screen time, I really enjoyed him! I'll be going back to see it when it releases in theaters so I can get a better feel for the sound, as it wasn't the best in an outdoor setting. In my opinion, it easily beats the other animated movies released over the past year or so.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":393517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tangled
Vrlo zapetljana priča
programme.desc:
Tangled: Directed by Nathan Greno, Byron Howard. With Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy, Ron Perlman. The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0398286/","name":"Tangled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxNDYxMjg0MjNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDcyNTk2OTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0398286/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maestro-20"},"dateCreated":"2010-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disney's back with their fairytale","reviewBody":"I was apprehensive, to say the least, when I went to see Tangled, after the disappointment that was Princess and the Frog. First, Disney's back with CGI animation, which hasn't really worked that great except, maybe to some extent, Bolt. Second, the trailers made it look really slapstick -- I'm rather wary of today's animation features that try too hard to be hip and fast-paced and silly.

I was pleasantly surprised. Sure, there were slapstick and broad humor sure to make little kiddos laugh. But I was surprised by the sophistication as well. The screwball comedy between the hero and heroine is very well done; adults can appreciate that. The sidekicks, in particular the Max and Pascal, are hilarious. The hero and heroine are very likable and not flat. And there's a sense of sadness/wistfulness throughout the whole show that the adults will understand.

But what really is great is the animation. This is Pixar-worthy great. In fact, after a while I forgot it was CGI (which tends to be a bit stiff and crude when it comes to character animation). The human characters have that hand-drawn quality even though they're CG. In fact, they're more expressive than the hand-drawn characters in Princess and the Frog. The backgrounds are gorgeous (I can count every blade of grass). And there's an iconic scene where the kingdom rouses from darkness to light with thousands of floating lanterns -- it really is magical. It reminds me of classics such as Beauty and the Beast and Sleeping Beauty.

Best of all, the movie is not just all laughs and slapstick. It has heart too. Even the minor characters such as the King and Queen -- you can feel the emotions. And the romance is believable and not cheesy.

Like I said, I was very pleasantly surprised. It's something that is worthy of Pixar, and I'm glad to see Disney back on their game. While Princess and the Frog was a missed opportunity, Tangled is almost perfect.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":428452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-12-01","keywords":"rapunzel,based on fairy tale,disney,flower,female protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tangled: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi385091865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The long-haired Princess Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but when she falls in love with a bandit who was passing by she must venture into the outside world for the first time to find him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601553/","name":"Mandy Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157048/","name":"Zachary Levi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614220/","name":"Donna Murphy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1977355/","name":"Nathan Greno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397174/","name":"Byron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342278/","name":"Jacob Grimm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342303/","name":"Wilhelm Grimm"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shrek 2
Shrek 2
programme.desc:
Shrek 2: Directed by Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon. With Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews. Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0298148/","name":"Shrek 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJhMGRjN2QtNDUxYy00NGM3LThjNGQtMmZiZTRhNjM4YzUxL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0298148/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"More Shrekervescence!","reviewBody":"I know what you're expecting me to say. "If you liked Shrek ..." And it's so true. Fans of the first will be ga-ga over the second. The gang at Dreamworks was smart enough not to monkey around with a winning formula, so you have all the wit and charm of Shrek (Mike Myers), Fiona (Cameron Diaz), Donkey (Eddie Murphy), and all the fantastic fairy-tale creatures.

At the beginning of 2, Shrek and Fiona have been invited by Fiona's parents (John Cleese and Julie Andrews) to the family castle. Imagine their surprise when the honeymooning ogres show up! Seems the king and queen haven't heard that a) Fiona's an ogre and b) that her husband is one, too. Naturally, this doesn't sit particularly well with the king, and soon he's hired a hit man - Puss in Boots, no less, voiced by Antonio Banderas - to bump off his new son in law. Meanwhile, a Fairy Godmother (Jennifer Saunders) offers help to Fiona. And quickly, the main question of the film - conveniently, it was the main question of the first film - is whether love conquers all. Oh, perhaps it's a bit more complex than that - perhaps it's whether Fiona would love Shrek, no matter what he looked like. Come to think of it, that was the theme of the first one as well. 

Shrek and Fiona journey to the land of Far, Far Away, where the stuffy king and the queen mum live. Far, Far Away is a clear knockoff of Hollywood itself (complete with the sign on the mountain), and the journey includes a pass through what looks like Beverly Hills. The attention to detail is marvelous, as always.

As with 1, 2 drops all sorts of Disney references, most resulting in full-out belly laughter. I was in stitches, although perhaps - just perhaps - some of the humor will zoom over your tiny tot's tiny head.

Shrek 2 is a beautifully done movie, perhaps even more entertaining than the original. Sure, at the end you know your emotions have been manipulated somewhat, but in the end you really don't care. Outstanding voice performances, flawless animation, and a crisp, moderately adult (but not mature, definitely not mature) script reign supreme.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":441517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-08-04","keywords":"reference to spider man,ogre,cat,princess,puss in boots","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1447231513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNGQwNjUtYmFlMS00ODdiLWI3YTUtNjViOWYzZmU2YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNGQwNjUtYmFlMS00ODdiLWI3YTUtNjViOWYzZmU2YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000196/","name":"Mike Myers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011470/","name":"Andrew Adamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0038432/","name":"Kelly Asbury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0970447/","name":"Conrad Vernon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0825308/","name":"William Steig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011470/","name":"Andrew Adamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0830294/","name":"Joe Stillman"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara. programme.title: Bad Santa 2
Zločesti Djed Mraz 2
programme.desc: Bad Santa 2: Directed by Mark Waters. With Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates, Tony Cox, Christina Hendricks. Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1798603/","name":"Bad Santa 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2MjE5Mzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjc3NjEyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1798603/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Decision","reviewBody":"Strained black comedy sequel reunites--for no reason that really makes any sense--Willie, the world's most vile Santa and his foulmouthed, feisty dwarf sidekick Marcus for yet another score, this time at a Chicago charity event on Christmas Eve. That darn kid returns, only this time he's a man (sort of), and as what's supposed to be an added bonus: Willie's equally crass mother (Bates, though even she is helpless against this flimsy material). Unnecessary, uninspired, and untimely follow-up doesn't have much of a plot to keep it afloat, playing mostly as an exercise in unfunny jokes, profane dialogue, and bodily fluids. Forced and forgettable, worth a few fleeting chuckles thanks to a well-chosen cast that elevates it as much as they possibly can. **"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24827,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-23","keywords":"santa claus character,ex convict,fired from the job,santas fighting,robbery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4187403801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185272/","name":"Tony Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914132/","name":"Mark Waters"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1752051/","name":"Johnny Rosenthal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189272/","name":"Shauna Cross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gladijator
programme.desc: Rimsko Carstvo, potkraj 2. stoljeća. Car Marko Aurelije (R. Harris) pokušava spriječiti prodor barbarskih plemena na sjevernim granicama u čemu mu presudno pomaže hrabri posinak i vojskovođa Maximus... Rimsko Carstvo, potkraj 2. stoljeća. Car Marko Aurelije (R. Harris) pokušava spriječiti prodor barbarskih plemena na sjevernim granicama u čemu mu presudno pomaže hrabri posinak i vojskovođa Maximus (R. Crowe). Nakon pobjede u krvavom boju, ostarjeli vladar upravo u Maximusu vidi svog nasljednika, iako ga u Rimu čeka njegov rođeni sin Komod (J. Phoenix). Doznavši da će ostati bez carske titule, beskrupulozni Komod odluči ubrzati stupanje na prijestolje, te nakon očeve smrti zapovjedi ubistvo Maximusa i njegove porodice. Za razliku od porodice, Maximus izbjegne smrt, ali ne i odlazak u roblje pri čemu ga kupuje Proximo (O. Reed) koji trenira najbolje gladijatore u Carstvu. Postavši Proximov najslavniji borac u areni, Maximus se zavjetuje da će usred Rima osvetiti smrt svoje neprežaljene porodice.

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
Psi iz rezervoara
programme.desc:
Reservoir Dogs: Directed by Quentin Tarantino. With Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn. When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0105236/","name":"Reservoir Dogs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmExNmEwYWItYmQzOS00YjA5LTk2MjktZjEyZDE1Y2QxNjA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105236/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hitchcockthelegend"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"For all I know you are the rat; and this might be the best heist homage movie ever?","reviewBody":"Reservoir Dogs is the debut of director and writer Quentin Tarantino. It stars Harvey Keitel, Steve Buscemi, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn, and Lawrence Tierney. Tarantino has a minor role, as does criminal-turned-author Eddie Bunker.

It feels a bit silly to write it now, but there was a time when Reservoir Dogs barely made a ripple in the cinema loving world; in America that is. Upon its release in the States it was moderately successful and comfortably made back its $1.2 million budget. However, upon hitting the British shores it was a big hit and grossed nearly £6.5 million and then Pulp Fiction exploded on the world in 94 and Reservoir Dogs got reappraised in its home country. The rest as they say is history.

Tarantino, the most enthusiastic of film fans, was once a video store clerk in Redondo Beach. There he dreamed of making his own movies and planned to make Reservoir Dogs with his friends on a relatively small budget. As luck would have it, Keitel got hold of the script and wanted in. With his name attached, and using his contacts, a serious budget was raised and so the Dogs were set loose. At the time of its popularity, Tarantino had to guardedly fend off accusations of plagiarism and a charge of just hacking from older classic heist movies. His argument was that he was making his own homage to the heist caper, but even so, the fact remains that Reservoir Dogs is spliced from The Killing, Kansas City Confidential, The Big Combo, The Taking Of Pelham One Two Three and we can definitely throw in The Asphalt Jungle as well.

Yet Reservoir Dogs is still extraordinarily fresh and vibrant, raising the bar for crime movies in the modern era. Tarantino of course has since gone on to prove his worth with other projects, so in truth his homage movie was merely the foot in the door for the talented son of Knoxville, Tennessee. In terms of its dialogue, tho, and its gleeful use of "ultra-violence," it has few peers. From any decade. It also helps considerably that Tarantino has assembled a quality cast to make his non-linear classic shine. Keitel is a given, but Roth is exceptional, as too is Buscemi, while Madsen is frighteningly convincing as psycho for hire Mr. Blonde. Then there's the 70s soundtrack, a vital part of the narrative as we hear the dulcet tones of Steven Wright Djing on K-Billy's Super Sounds of the Seventies. If you have not seen the film yet? Then I promise you will remember Stealers Wheel-Stuck in the Middle for the rest of your cinema loving days.

And that's the thing with Reservoir Dogs, it's crammed packed full of memorable things. A quip, a bang, a song or the WTF ending, as homages go; it's one of the very best. 9/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":969640,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1992-09-02","keywords":"heist gone wrong,nonlinear timeline,mexican standoff,robbery,graphic violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Reservoir Dogs: 10th Anniversary Edition","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3028484377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMDNkYTEtNzNlYi00OTU2LTg3ODMtMjg1MDUxZmIxYTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQxMDNkYTEtNzNlYi00OTU2LTg3ODMtMjg1MDUxZmIxYTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000514/","name":"Michael Madsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0112857/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000812/","name":"Roger Avary"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Snowpiercer
Snowpiercer
programme.desc:
Snowpiercer: Directed by Bong Joon Ho. With Chris Evans, Kang-ho Song, Ed Harris, John Hurt. In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1706620/","name":"Snowpiercer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NzA1MTY3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzE2Mzg5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1706620/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Vartiainen"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dark social science fiction","reviewBody":"Snowpiercer was a surprise to me. I thought it would be just another "social commentary" dystopian film trying to ride the coattails of The Hunger Games craze. Instead what I ended up getting was one of the best post-apocalyptic films I've ever seen. A smooth roller coaster of action and quiet, dark dialogue.

And don't get me wrong, it is another "social commentary" dystopian film, and yes, perhaps it's riding The Hunger Games craze just a little bit. But, when that riding ends up producing a film of this quality, is it a bad thing? And it's not like The Hunger Games invented the idea of alternative future where the poor are trying to usurp the rich people that are controlling them from their towers of ivory. These are both just variations of Orwell's 1984, which draws heavily from the age old tale of the underdog, David versus Goliath.

It's the execution of an idea that makes or breaks a film and here that execution is nigh flawless. Everything from the design of the train to the A-list cast of actors to the storyline that keeps up the relentless pace, but still has time to reflect on the motives, histories and moods of the characters.

Snowpiercer is simplistic art. It doesn't try to win you over with limitless of details, high explosives or flashiness. Rather it takes a central idea and fills it with as much quality as possible. Highly recommended for all fans of science fiction out there.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":345264,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-08-01","keywords":"train,perpetual winter,closed ecological system,population control,dystopia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1214688537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5OTYwNjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc5MTAyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5OTYwNjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc5MTAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where a failed global-warming experiment kills off all life on the planet except for a lucky few that boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, where a class system evolves.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262635/","name":"Chris Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068260/","name":"Jamie Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094435/","name":"Bong Joon Ho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0364224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0157434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058896/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2441468/","name":"Jacques Lob"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0499429/","name":"Benjamin Legrand"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2440893/","name":"Jean-Marc Rochette"}],"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shark Tale
Riba ribi grize rep
programme.desc: Shark Tale: Directed by Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson, Rob Letterman. With Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Renée Zellweger, Jack Black. When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0307453/","name":"Shark Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMjY0NzE2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc3ODcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0307453/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"The_Orenda"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something was missing.","reviewBody":"I can't explain why I didn't like Shark Tale too much. Visually there is a creative backdrop which is absolutely beautiful. I wonder if they just took pictures of New York, doused it underwater and worked around the scenery. Because with the exception of that imagery, Shark Tale has a very loud, very brash, in-your-face mentality that takes away from the movie. Other features like The Little Mermaid and Finding Nemo invite you to the paradise of being under the sea. Shark Tale throws you in the middle of the loudest club and tells you to get down on it. I don't buy it and with the exception of some visual gags, nobody else could neither. This is also another movie where Will Smith can get back into his Fresh Prince gear and get away with it and Jack Black could play a gender confused shark and be accepted for it as well. I wanted to enjoy the scenery and the sight of an underground New York. Shark Tale offered it but instead beat us silly with all the hoopla we see everyday on the television set. What a disappointment. Enjoy the humor and expect nothing more.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-01-12","keywords":"fish,shark,pufferfish,sea turtle,anthropomorphic animal","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shark Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2072445209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "October 1st""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074426/","name":"Bibo Bergeron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421776/","name":"Vicky Jenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5022110/","name":"Michael J. IMDb data; ttnr: 0307453, Title: Shark Tale, --- Description: Shark Tale: Directed by Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson, Rob Letterman. With Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Renée Zellweger, Jack Black. When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0307453/","name":"Shark Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMjY0NzE2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc3ODcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0307453/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"The_Orenda","dateCreated":"2004-11-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something was missing.","reviewBody":"I can't explain why I didn't like Shark Tale too much. Visually there is a creative backdrop which is absolutely beautiful. I wonder if they just took pictures of New York, doused it underwater and worked around the scenery. Because with the exception of that imagery, Shark Tale has a very loud, very brash, in-your-face mentality that takes away from the movie. Other features like The Little Mermaid and Finding Nemo invite you to the paradise of being under the sea. Shark Tale throws you in the middle of the loudest club and tells you to get down on it. I don't buy it and with the exception of some visual gags, nobody else could neither. This is also another movie where Will Smith can get back into his Fresh Prince gear and get away with it and Jack Black could play a gender confused shark and be accepted for it as well. I wanted to enjoy the scenery and the sight of an underground New York. Shark Tale offered it but instead beat us silly with all the hoopla we see everyday on the television set. What a disappointment. Enjoy the humor and expect nothing more.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-01-12","keywords":"fish,shark,pufferfish,sea turtle,anthropomorphic animal","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shark Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2072445209","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "October 1st"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074426/","name":"Bibo Bergeron","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421776/","name":"Vicky Jenson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5022110/","name":"Michael J. programme.title: Puss in Boots
Mačak u čizmama
programme.desc:
Puss in Boots: Directed by Chris Miller. With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis, Billy Bob Thornton. An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor and regain the trust of his mother and town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448694/","name":"Puss in Boots","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMTU5MTY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzgyNjg2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor and regain the trust of his mother and town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lpucci"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A worthy yet slightly flawed successor","reviewBody":"I was able to see the San Francisco premiere for Puss N' Boots last night. I would say the audience was about 50% children and 50% adults. The movie was shown in 3D and I would definitely recommend it.

The star of the movie was definitely Banderas's Puss. If you liked the character from previous movies, you will not be disappointed. Salma Hayak as Kitty Softpaws was decent enough although not very memorable in any way. And finally, Zach Galifianakis's Humpty Dumpty will be a polarizing character in my opinion. If you thought Rumpelstiltskin from Shrek Forever After was a tad on the annoying side, I think you'll feel the same way about Humpty Dumpty.

Anyways, the story is good. The integration of former players in nursery rhymes and fairy tales is seamless. And the comedy is standard Shrek-style delivering lots of laughs for children and the occasional adult-only joke (some very funny).

The visuals are stunning. And the music is fantastic. It almost felt like an action-packed spaghetti western with a Latin flavor. I definitely enjoyed myself. I also talked to quite a few people afterwords and the consensus was that the children all loved it and the adults kept using the word "cute" in so many different ways to describe their feelings about the movie."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":152359,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-11-16","keywords":"anthropomorphic animal,origin of hero,action hero,action heroine,split screen","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1870831129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNjM4NzMxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDU3NjUyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNjM4NzMxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDU3NjUyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this early adventure for the sword fighting cat, Puss in Boots teams with mastermind Humpty Dumpty (Zach Galifianakis) and the street-savvy Kitty (Salma Hayek) to steal the famed Goose that lays the Golden Eggs. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000104/","name":"Antonio Banderas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000161/","name":"Salma Hayek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0302108/","name":"Zach Galifianakis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1844237/","name":"Chris Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1117226/","name":"Tom Wheeler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528244/","name":"Brian Lynch"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204030/","name":"William Davies"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shrek the Third
Shrek Treći
programme.desc:
Shrek the Third: Directed by Chris Miller, Raman Hui. With Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas. Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413267/","name":"Shrek the Third","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyMjc3ODk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413267/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Denden667"},"dateCreated":"2007-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shrek 3, a pleasant surprise after all the hideous hype.","reviewBody":"I have just been pleasantly surprised by Shrek 3. Trying to ignore all the hype around it, I tried to watch it (on DVD) as the second sequel to one of my favourite films, nothing more. Although it comes nowhere near the quality of the first film, it does try to recreate its pleasant pacing and isn't overstuffed with easy film/commercial/real life-reference jokes (I'm looking at you, Shrek 2). And if one pops up, than it got more laughs out of me than Far Far Away ever did in Shrek 2. The Medieval high School was just hilarious, especially the mix-up between today's teen slang and Middle English. As an English student, it really appealed to me.

I really liked the dialogue between the characters like in Shrek 1, it's something I kind of missed in Shrek 2, where the characters just jumped from one crazy situation to the next with a few one-liners her and there. What I did miss, was the bickering between Puss and Donkey. Both characters do in fact get way too little screen time, and that's a big mistake since both characters were the highlights of Shrek 2. Somewhere near the end they do get in a situation that brings back some of the comedy gold of Shrek 2, but it's too little and too late.

All the old characters get to do something funny, but in the end they are all just great to see as old friends you know from the past. It's nice to see Donkey, Puss and Shrek get along so well with each other, but there's nothing more they can do to fill another film. We know the characters, and they have all found a place in the world they live in. I have gotten all I wanted out of the overall storyline, I'm happy with the way things are for the characters now, and I don't mind that the third journey had to replace the "insert joke every few seconds"-mentality of Shrek 2 with a bit more storytelling. There were still plenty of big laughs left, I can tell you.

Ultimately, Shrek 2 was funnier, but I think I like Shrek 3 better. I felt that this adventure was more meaningful for all the characters, and I know that this is the part where a lot of critics thought it wasn't necessary. But if you ask me, Shrek 3 was unnecessary. But since they really had to make a Shrek 3, I think they did well to make the adventure a bit more meaningful and make it really count in the end. It's only too bad that the message is the same of the previous two films, we get it already.

The only thing I really didn't like was one of the major characters they used to tell us again that you must accept yourself and others as they are. Artie was a really un-Shrek character. His speeches were dull and Justin Timberlake does nothing to make the character more likable. Of course, he has little to work with. I liked Justin timberlake's part better as a poster in Shrek 2 with the text "Sir Justin". It was funnier than anything Artie said or did in Shrek 3. Let Shrek, Donkey or Puss do the talking, dude.

As far as I'm concerned, Shrek 3 was an unnecessary sequel that still worked for me with some good humour and the characters being as charming as ever. The story was more meaningful for the main characters. The end of this adventure, even though repeating the message of the previous films, provided me with satisfying closure on the story of the happy Shrek family. Too bad that another unnecessary sequel is coming, undoubtedly with even more hype and more dull characters like Artie. Sadly, the Shrek franchise seems to be the most inspired thing coming from Dreamworks Animations.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294501,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"shrek,king,puss in boots,donkey,kingdom","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek the Third","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1484980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI0NmI0MTItYzIzNy00YzcwLTk3ZmItZDU0MTAyM2JjOGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI0NmI0MTItYzIzNy00YzcwLTk3ZmItZDU0MTAyM2JjOGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000196/","name":"Mike Myers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1844237/","name":"Chris Miller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0401203/","name":"Raman Hui"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696949/","name":"Jeffrey Price"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780620/","name":"Peter S. Seaman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1844237/","name":"Chris Miller"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Home Alone 3
Sam u kući 3
programme.desc:
Home Alone 3: Directed by Raja Gosnell. With Alex D. Linz, Olek Krupa, Rya Kihlstedt, Lenny von Dohlen. Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119303/","name":"Home Alone 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTJhYjVhOWMtYTUyOS00NWM0LThjNzYtZWYxOTkwN2FhODg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119303/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"emasterslake"},"dateCreated":"2006-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not the same.","reviewBody":"Has the same title only this ain't the Home Alone you'd all be familiar with.

No one from the original is in it. And the plot to it isn't as amusing as the first 2 were.

This one has to do with some secret group of agents accidentally misplaced there product at the airport which has some important chip in it that's top secret. They track down where the product is which is in Chicago, and located in somewhere in a neighborhood. 4 agents now have to check every house and find that chip.

A kid who's supposed to be the new version of Kevin has the chip only he doesn't know it yet.

He likes to watch neighbors with his telescope and goof around. When he notices the agents breaking into the neighbor's homes, he calls the police. When they get there they didn't find any of the intruders in the neighbor's home. When the agents plan on breaking into our main hero's home, he has to prepare himself to set up traps and give them hell.

This movie was good at first but it's not the same. Those who like the first 2 Home Alone movies, you might not like this one. Rent it first, and see for yourself.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113021,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1997-12-12","keywords":"chicken pox,tape over mouth,silicon valley california,silicon valley,hong kong","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Home Alone 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2796355865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U4Y2Q2ZjQtYWMzNi00NDQzLWJkNDktYWYyYmM1ZDViYTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U4Y2Q2ZjQtYWMzNi00NDQzLWJkNDktYWYyYmM1ZDViYTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0513281/","name":"Alex D. programme.desc: Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre: Directed by Alain Chabat. With Gérard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze, Monica Bellucci. Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250223/","name":"Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q3NmUzNjAtM2VjMS00MGU3LWE4YjEtZTM1NDM0YTdlOWRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250223/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"soringax"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exclusively French, but Monica is awesome","reviewBody":"You cannot be seeing the same movie if you didn't grow up in France (or spent at least 10 years there, like me). I don't know if it will ever make it outside French cultural borders (I include Belgium and Luxembourg here). You cannot translate its kind of fun - every name is joke (how many people outside Paris would understand the pun in "Couloirdebus", the name of one of the Roman legionnaires ?). However Monica Bel(l?)ucci is so beautiful, I almost forgot to breathe when I saw her.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51429,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-01-30","keywords":"architect,based on comic book,egypt,druid,cleopatra","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979890201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331453/","name":"René Goscinny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879853/","name":"Albert Uderzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc: Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nikolaijensen"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"I saw a press viewing this morning, this is a good film","reviewBody":"First of all, what can beat Gladiator, with lines like "father to a murdered son, husband to a murdered wife", etc. and Russell Crowe chopping off heads. Kingdom of Heaven is a similar heroic fable yet the good and evil polarity is slightly more ambiguous. I would say it was vastly better than Alexander. Ridley Scott's style (cinematography and music) as seen in Black Hawk Down and Gladiator also lend a wonderful historical ambiance. Orlando Bloom does a fine job as the lead, and the French actress is fantastic (and beautiful), but my favorite lead was the Leper King and the wise nobility of his character. The battle scenes are excellent (including one in falling snow in which the snowflakes seem to hang in the air) and the armies look very historically realistic - this is a very good-looking epic. Formulaic perhaps, but well-executed. Kingdom of Heaven made me feel like leaving the "blacksmithy" that is our dull modern urban existence and finding a cause worth fighting for, but Crusades just aren't what they used to be =D","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":278586,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dedpull
programme.desc: 2016.Ryan Reynolds. Pas një eksperimenti të frikshëm që e lë më aftësinë për t'u rigjeneruar dhe me një sens humori shumë të veçantë, një ish-agjent i forcave speciale vishet me një kostum superheroi dhe merr një identitet të ri.

komedi

programme.title: Kolumbiania
programme.desc: Zoe Saldana , Jordi Molla . Pasi bëhet dëshmitare e vrasjes së prindërve, një vajzë e re kolumbiane kthehet në një vrasëse profesioniste. Tani misioni i saj është vetëm një, të gjejë dhe të ndëshkojë pa asnjë mëshirë përgjegjësit e krimit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në rrezik për jetën 2
programme.desc: Michael Jai White. Gjatë një ndeshje basketbolli, që ndiqet nga mijëra spektatorë, një roje sigurie, ish ekspert i forcave speciale, zbulon sulmin e planifikuar nga një grup terroristësh. Tani, përballja e vërtetë zhvillohet jashtë fushe...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Lajmëtari: Hijet e së shkuarës

programme.title: Batman: Hallouini i gjatë, Pjesa II
programme.desc: Vrasësi i njohur si "Holiday" vazhdon të përndjekë familjen e krimit, Falkone, ndërsa një klasë e re kriminelësh po fuqizohet në qytetin e Gothamit. Vigjilenti Batmani ka filluar të ketë dyshimet e para se kush mund të jetë vrasësi që po terrorizon të gji.

programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Për Krishtlindje martohem
programme.desc: Massimo Boldi, Nancy Brilli, Elisabetta Canalis. Një kuzhinier i thjeshtë, djali i tij adoleshent dhe dy ndihmësa, do të krijojnë një mal me telashe dhe do të vënë në dilemë një dasmë mjaft të kushtueshme...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.category: Komedi

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Moderne dhe gënjeshtare
programme.desc: Isla Fisher, Hugh Dancy. Një vajzë që nuk u reziston dot blerjeve nëpër dyqane dhe është e mbytur në borxhe, fillon punë si gazetare në një revistë, ku i duhet të shkruajë sesi të kursesh para nga blerjet e tepërta...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Shkëmbim identitetesh
programme.desc: Nje mashtrues dhe nje batakçi rrugesh do te jene viktimat e nje basti mes milioneresh. Jetet e tyre do te behen çorap kur nderrojne vendet. Mashtruesit i duhet te mesoje ligjet e biznesit dhe pasaniku si te mbijetoje rrugeve te qytetit.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Krishtlindje me babagjyshin
programme.desc: Katër motra krejt të ndryshme nga njëra-tjetra, mblidhen në rezidencën luksoze të familjes për të festuar krishtlindjet e përkryera. Por grindjet, keqkuptimet komike dhe rishfaqja e babait që i braktisi në vogëli, çojnë në zbulimin e sekretit që ndau fami.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vëllezër me pahir
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly. Dy burra rreth të 40-ave, që s'kanë arritur asgjë në jetë, detyrohen të ndajnë të njëjtën dhomë, kur prindërit e tyre vendosin të martohen...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vegjetuesit
programme.desc: Claudio Bisio. Bazuar në romanin best seller të Michele Serra. Marrëdhënia e ndërlikuar mes një babai të përkushtuar dhe djalit të tij adoleshent.
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Spanglisht
programme.desc: A.Sandler, T.Leoni. Flor mbërrin bashkë me të bijën nga Meksika në SHBA për një jetë me të mirë. Takon kuzhinierin Klaski, një shef me nam që e punëson në shtëpinë e tij. Por, si të merret vesh për të thënë ato që do?
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ish e dashura ime
programme.desc: 2006. U.Thurman, L.Wilson. Matt Saunders-i, fort i ngathët me femrat, takon Jenny Johnson-in, bukuroshen që s'ka asgjë të përbashkët me vajzat që ai ka njohur deri tani. Ai ndjehet burri më me fat i botës, por kjo s'do të vazhdoje gjate.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Stazhierët
programme.desc: Vince Vaughn, Owen Wilson. Dy shitës orash me eksperiencë, humbin vendet e punes për shkak të dixhitalizimit të botës. Në përpjekje për të provuar se ende mund t'ia dalin, ata arrijnë të futen si stazhierë në kompaninë Google...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Krishtlindje në Kortina
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Sabrina Ferilli. Nje grup miqsh, shkojnë në Kortina për të kaluar pushime të qeta në kohën e festave, ose të paktën kështu besojnë... Sigurisht që aventurat, keqkuptimet dhe të qeshurat nuk do të kenë të sosur...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Policë në rezervë
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg, Will Ferrell. Teri dhe Allen, dy 'policë në rezervë' bien në gjurmët e një krimineli shumë të rrezikshëm. Që nga ky çast fama për ta është vetëm një hap larg, mbetet veç zgjidhja e çështjes...
programme.category: Komedi
aksion

programme.title: Krishtlindje në Londër: Zoti e ruajte Mb
programme.desc: Një aventurë Italiane nga Volfabgo De Biasi. Këtë vit për festa, të qeshurat do t'ju cojnë në Londër. Me komedianët e njohur Lillo dhe Greg. Dy vëllezër e gjejnë veten për Krishtlindje në Londër, duke festuar bashkë me dy qenushët e Mbretëreshes së A.
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Thjesht... e ndërlikuar
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin, Steve Martin. Një grua bie në dashuri me ish burrin e saj tashmë të martuar me dikë tjetër, ndërkohë që një arkitekt, bie në dashuri me të. Duket histori konfuze, por është thjesht... e ndërlikuar!
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Fatlumi
programme.desc: Vincenzo Salemme, Asia Argento. Një polic trafiku me një jetë kaotike, mendon se problemet morën fund, kur një shoqja e tij fiton lotarinë dhe martohet me të. Por fati ka rezervuar të tjera aventura...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Komedianët
programme.desc: Adam Sandler, Seth Rogen. Jeta perfekte e aktorit komik Xhorxh Simons, tronditet nga lajmi i papritur i një sëmundjeje të pashërueshme. Pjesën e kohës që i ka mbetur do t'ia bëjë më të bukur një takim i rastësishëm me një aspirant komedie.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Luftë mes krushqish
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2010. Forest Whitaker, Carlos Mencia, America Ferrera. Ndërkohë që planifikojnë ditën e dasmës, një çift i ri duhet të përballet jo vetëm me stresin e zakonshëm, por edhe me zënkat dhe telashet e dy baballarëve të tyre.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Raporti i Pakicës
programme.desc: Regjia: Steven Spielberg. Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell. Në të ardhmen, një program që zbulon krimet para se të ndodhin, identifikon një nga oficerët më të mirë si personin e rradhës dhe ai duhet të marrë arratinë dhe të zbulojë të vërtetën..
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Në garë me kohën
programme.desc: Nje shef policie ben nje gabim i nisur nga zemermiresia e tij e per kete i duhet te paguaje nje çmim te shtrenjte. Vjedh parate e gjetura gjate nje aksioni te policise dhe ia jep dashnores pa e ditur qe e gjitha kjo ishte pjese e nje plani.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vjedhje ne Valencia
programme.desc: Një grup grabitësish ekspertë sulmojnë një bankë për të vjedhur vetëm një kuti sigurie. Pasi plani i arratisjes dështon, grabitësit, policia, politikanët, bankierët përpiqen të gjithë të zotërojnë kutinë e sigurisë. Cilët janë hajdutët?
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Dritarja e fshehtë
programme.desc: Pas ndarjes me të shoqen, shkrimtari i famshëm Mort Rainey, përballet papritur, në shtëpinë e tij të vetmuar buzë liqenit me një te panjohur të rrezikshëm. Quhet John Shooter dhe pretendon se Ranye i ka kopjuar tregimin e tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Djali i ëndrrave
programme.desc: Sanaa Lathan, Michael Ealy, Morris Chestnut. Pasi ndahet nga i dashuri, një grua e suksesshme njihet me një djalë në dukje perfekt. Por kur ish i dashuri rishfaqet, ajo duhet të vendosë se kujt duhet t'i besojë e kujt t'i frikësohet.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: UFO
programme.desc: 2018. Alex Sharp, Gillian Anderson. Një student kolegji, i cili është i bindur se ka parë UFO kur ka qënë fëmijë, përdor aftësitë e tij të jashtëzakonshme matematikore për të vërtetuar ekzistencën e tyre, ndërsa ndiqet hap pas hapi nga FBI-ja.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Kush i vrau kukullat
programme.desc: 2018. Melissa McCarthy. Dy detektivë me një sekret të përbashkët, njëri kukull dhe tjetri njeri, detyrohen të punojnë serish bashkë për të zbardhur vrasjet makabre të kukullave të një programi televiziv shumë të dashur të viteve '90.
programme.category: Komedi e zezë
krim

programme.title: Bunkeri
programme.desc: 2016. Pas një aksidenti me makinë, një grua zgjohet brenda bunkerit të një njeriu që i thotë se vendi është i pabanueshëm. Por dyshuese dhe e frikësuar prej tij, ajo do të duhet të arratiset për të zbuluar të vërtetën.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Vrasësi i mirë
programme.desc: 2014. Ethan Hawke, January Jones. Një pilot dronesh që lufton armikun nga siguria e një bunkeri mijëra kilometra larg fushës së betejës, fillon të ndryshojë mendimin e tij për luftën...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Zemra në Atlantis
programme.desc: Ted Brotigen, i sapoardhur në qyteze, krijon një lidhje të fortë me djaloshin Bob, i cili mahnitet por edhe frikësohet nga fuqitë e pazakonta psikike të mikut te tij. Në fund, djali kupton ç'do te thote kurajo dhe falje.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: E vërteta rreth Emanuelës
programme.desc: Jessica Biel, Alfred Molina. Një adoleshente e trazuar fiksohet pas fqinjës së re, e cila ngjason me të ëmës e saj të vdekur. Ndërsa afrimiteti mes tyre rritet gjithmonë e më shumë, një sekret i frikshëm do të dalë në pah...
programme.category: Thiller
dramë

programme.title: Faza e lojës
programme.desc: R.Crowe, B.Affleck. Stiven Kollins është një kongresmen i suksesshëm, karriera e të cilit do të rrezikohet pas vrasjes së assitentes së tij. Një gazetar investigativ, njohje e tij e vjeter, do të vihet në kërkim të së vërtetës.
programme.category: Thriller politik

programme.title: Vrasje gjakftohtë
programme.desc: 2019. Jean Reno. Një vrasës legjender tërhiqet në qetësinë e një shtëpie të izoluar buzë liqenit. Takimi rastësor me një grua dhe sekreti që ajo fsheh, mund ta detyrojnë atë t'u rikthehet mënyrave të tij vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Eskobari: Parajsa e humbur
programme.desc: 2014. Benicio Del Toro, Josh Hutcherson. Kur një i ri kanadez bie në dashuri me mbesën e Pablo Eksobarit, jeta e tij vihet në rrezik, pasi pak e nga pak ai fillon të përfshihet në biznesin e rrezikshëm të familjes...
programme.category: Thriller
romancë

programme.title: Të ndarë nga gjaku
programme.desc: 2007.Michael Shannon, Douglas Ligon. Pas vdekjes së një njeriu që kishte 4 djem me 2 gra të ndryshme, midis tyre fillon një konflikt i dhunshëm që s'dihet sesi mund të përfundojë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Stërvitja
programme.desc: 2003. John Travolta, Connic Nielsen, Samuel L. Jackson, Giovanni Ribisi. Një agjent i DEA-s heton mbi zhdukjen e një rreshteri legjendar të Ushtrise dhe të disa kursanteve të tij gjatë një ushtrimi stërvitjeje që kishte shkuar keq.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Prejardhja
programme.desc: 2018. Seann W. Scott. Për Evanin që sapo është bërë baba, familja është mbi gjithçka. Por mbrojtja e të dashurve të tij dhe ushtrimi i dhunës së shfrenuar ndaj atyre që guxojnë, ndahen nga një vijë e hollë që ai e ka të vështirë të mos e kalojë...
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Kronika
programme.desc: 2012. Dane DeHaan. Tre studentë, bëjnë nje zbulim të jashtëzakonshëm, që do t'ju japë superfuqi të paimagjinueshme. Por ndërkohë që secili përpiqet të mësohet me aftësitë e reja, jetët e tyre do të marrin një kthesë të tmerrshme...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Zgjuar
programme.desc: 2007. Hayden Christensen, Jessica Alba, Terrence Howard. Një i ri, i cili i nënshtrohet një operacioni në zemër, përjeton një efekt ku anestezia e lë zgjuar, por të paralizuar e të paaftë për të paralajmëruar doktorët për tmerrin që e pret.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Fluturimi i Feniksit
programme.desc: D.Quaid. Një avion mallrash në udhëtim rutinë përfshihet në vorbullen e një stuhie të paparë dhe bie në shkretëtirën e Gobit. Mes te mbijetuarve, një pasagjer i çuditshëm do të marrë situatën në dorë dhe do t'i vërë të gjithë në punë.
programme.category: Thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Gënjeshtra
programme.desc: 2018. Peter Sarsgaard, Joey King. Kur vajza e tyre adoleshente rrëfen se ka kryer një krim të tmerrshëm, dy prindër të dëshpëruar përpiqen të mbulojnë krimin duke ngritur një rrjet gënjeshtrash dhe mashtrimi.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Xhesi Stoun Shkembim goditjesh
programme.desc: Tom Sellec. Një vrasje e dyfishtë detyron ish-sherifin e qytezës së Parajsës të lërë pensionin e t'i kthehet detyrës. Në këtë çështje të rrethuar nga një mori gjurmësh çorientuese, atij i mbetet vetëm të mbështetet tek eksperienca e tij.
programme.category: Krim
thriller\t

programme.title: Lumi i tmerrit
programme.desc: M.Streep, K.Bacon. Një familje niset në një ekspedite me gomone në ujerat e një lumi të rrëmbyeshëm. Papritur, kjo zbavitje shndërrohet në një makth të frikshëm që rrezikon t'u marre jetët kur dy të panjohur bashkohen me ta.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Vrasja e parë
programme.desc: 2017. Bruce Willis, Hayden Christensen. Gjatë pushimeve me familjen, babë e bir, bëhen dëshmitarë të një grabitjeje banke dhe vrasjeje. Kur i biri merret peng, babai detyrohet të ndihmojë kriminelët të gjejnë paratë, përpara një polici që po bën gjit.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: 47 metra nën det
programme.desc: 2017. Mandy Moore, Claire Holt. Dy motra me pushime në Meksikë, bllokohen në një kafaz hekuri 47 metra nën det. Me vetëm 1 orë oksigjen dhe me peshkaqenë të shumtë që sillen rrotull, ato duhet të gjejnë sa më shpejt një mënyrë për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Histori e vërtetë
programme.desc: Jonah Hill, James Franco. Kur ish-gazetari i "New York Times", Majkëll Finkel i pushuar nga puna për mashtrim, takohet me vrasësin Kristian Longo, hetimi i tij për të zbuluar të vërtetën kthehet në një lojë të rrezikshme.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Në kërkim të arit
programme.desc: 2016. Matthew McConaughey, Edgar Ramírez. Një njeri i dëshpëruar për të ringritur biznesin e mineraleve, bashkë me një gjeolog fillon një mision të rrezikshëm për të gjetur ar në xhunglën e Indonezisë.
programme.category: Thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc: Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nikolaijensen"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"I saw a press viewing this morning, this is a good film","reviewBody":"First of all, what can beat Gladiator, with lines like "father to a murdered son, husband to a murdered wife", etc. and Russell Crowe chopping off heads. Kingdom of Heaven is a similar heroic fable yet the good and evil polarity is slightly more ambiguous. I would say it was vastly better than Alexander. Ridley Scott's style (cinematography and music) as seen in Black Hawk Down and Gladiator also lend a wonderful historical ambiance. Orlando Bloom does a fine job as the lead, and the French actress is fantastic (and beautiful), but my favorite lead was the Leper King and the wise nobility of his character. The battle scenes are excellent (including one in falling snow in which the snowflakes seem to hang in the air) and the armies look very historically realistic - this is a very good-looking epic. Formulaic perhaps, but well-executed. Kingdom of Heaven made me feel like leaving the "blacksmithy" that is our dull modern urban existence and finding a cause worth fighting for, but Crusades just aren't what they used to be =D","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":278586,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="
